_source.text: According to both the National Audit Office and the London School of Economics, failing schools that have been turned into academies under new sponsors are performing better than those that did not.

text: According to both the **National** **Audit** **Office** and the London School of Economics, failing schools
that have been turned into academies under new sponsors are performing **better** **than** those that did not.

_source.text: After its most successful year to date, F&E is already working with the UAE Ministry of Education to ensure GESS and GEF 2012 is bigger and better than ever.

text: After its most successful year to date, F&E is already working with the UAE **Ministry** **of** **Education** to ensure GESS and GEF 2012 is bigger and **better** **than** ever.

_source.text: Adopting the slogan 'Prevention is better than cure', this Ministry of Health poster attempts to persuade people to adopt a healthier lifestyle.

text: Adopting the slogan 'Prevention **is** **better** **than** cure', this **Ministry** **of** **Health** poster attempts to persuade people to adopt a healthier lifestyle.
